publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3772 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Clydebank Re-built on Awards for the Titan Crane—That the Parliament congratulates Clydebank Re-built for winning the Civic Trust Award as well as the first Scotland Placemaking Civic Trust Award for the successful restoration of the A-listed Titan Crane, which towers over the old John Brown shipyard and has now been praised for its successful regeneration as a visitor attraction.

S3M-3772 Congratulations to Clydebank Re-built on Awards for the Titan Crane (lodged on 23 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*, Sandra White*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3772 Congratulations to Clydebank Re-built on Awards for the Titan Crane (lodged on 23 March 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Alison McInnes*, Des McNulty*

S3M-3772 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Clydebank Re-built on Awards for the Titan Crane—That the Parliament congratulates Clydebank Re-built for winning the Civic Trust Award as well as the first Scotland Placemaking Civic Trust Award for the successful restoration of the A-listed Titan Crane, which towers over the old John Brown shipyard and has now been praised for its successful regeneration as a visitor attraction. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Mike Pringle, Hugh O’Donnell, Stewart Maxwell, Bob Doris, Gil Paterson, Sandra White, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry, Bill Kidd, Kenneth Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Alison McInnes, Des McNulty, Jack McConnell*
